document_name: Ministerial Order No. 9.048 on the Steering Committee of the Program 'Towards a Local Development Less Emitter of Greenhouse Gases and More Resistant to Climate Change (TACC Senegal)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/SEN/2010/SEN-2010-08-10-Ministerial Order No. 9.048 on the Steering Committee of the Program 'Towards a Local Development Less Emitter of Greenhouse Gases and More Resistant to Climate Change (TACC Senegal)_eb672747ee8ed8e05b72bba30af7e75b.pdf
document_description: This decree creates a Steering Committee of the Project "Integration of Adaptation to Climate Change in Sustainable Development in Senegal (TACC Senegal)". It defines structure and functions of the Committee.
